meanings.definition: The act of renouncing or giving up something.
meanings.sent1: Her renouncements of unhealthy habits led to a happier life.
meanings.sent2: The renouncements of his possessions surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The renouncements of desserts made her friends joke that she must be a secret superhero.
meanings.sent4: His renouncements of fear were like shedding a heavy cloak.
meanings.sent5: The renouncements of old beliefs opened up new possibilities.

meanings.definition: A formal declaration of abandonment or disownment.
meanings.sent1: The renouncements of his title shocked the entire kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The renouncements of his family inheritance caused a rift.
meanings.sent3: His renouncements of responsibility were met with raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The renouncements of allegiance were like cutting ties with the past.
meanings.sent5: The renouncements of his former identity marked a new beginning.
